StoryText: I am hanging out with some classmates before class when I see this annoying person walk by and I comment on how this person is annoying.
Question: It turns out this is %FullName:NPC:1%'s sibling so, what should I say now?

OptionText.Text: "So, you know what I mean, huh?"

OptionResult.Result: Nobody buys this, especially %FullName:NPC:1%, and now they all think I'm a jerk.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I suppose I shouldn't have commented on random people when talking to classmates I don't know so well. You never know who is related to who. Now, %FullName:NPC:1% thinks I'm a jerk, as do many of my other classmates.

OptionResult.Result: When I say this jokingly, %FullName:NPC:1% laughs about it and agrees with me.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Whoa, saved myself there! Not wavering and just being lighthearted and funny about it, %FullName:NPC:1% and everyone else got a good laugh about it and didn't think I genuinely despised this person... even though I kind of do. That's a smart way to get myself out of a jam!

Every one of my classmates was laughing about this and telling me I'm so funny, except for %FullName:NPC:1% who is staring daggers at me the rest of the day. Oops! At least everyone else is on my side.
